Title: Prohibits the court from granting custody of or unsupervised visitation with a child to a person who has been convicted of or charged with raping the parent of the child
Summary: Prohibits the court from granting custody of or unsupervised visitation with a child to a person who has been convicted or accused of raping the parent of the child.
LawCode: Amd ยง240, Dom Rel L; add ยง553, amd ยง651, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law and the family court act, in relation to prohibiting the court from granting custody of or unsupervised visitation with a child to a person who has been convicted of or charged with raping the parent of the child
